## GameObject.(constructor)

Consruct a new gameObject

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript

```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  name | string | the name of this gameObject |
|  obj | [TransformParams](api/eva.js.transformparams.md) | optional transform parameters for default Transform component |
